DOC.brief_title: High Volume Injection Autologous Conditioned Plasma ( ACP ) Chronic Achilles Tendinopathy
DOC.detailed_description: Chronic Achilles tendinopathy ( AT ) common impair disorder . Only sparse scientific evidence exist present used treatment golden standard treatment exist far . Aim : The aim study AT patient examine compare effect high volume injection ( HVI ) autologous condition plasma ( ACP ) combination eccentric training placebo treatment ( sham treatment eccentric exercise ) . Materials method : Healthy male ( 21-59 year ; n=60 ) AT randomly assign either 1 ) HVI ( 50 ml ; 10 ml 0.5 % bupivacaine hydrochloride 20 mg Depomedrol follow 40 ml saline ) , 2 ) ACP ( ~ 4 ml ) 3 ) placebo ( Plc ) treatment . Participants treat 4 successive occasion 2 week ( wks ) interval ( HVI inject baseline , 3 follow injection placebo ) . The injection perform ultrasound guidance . All subject undergo 12-wk eccentric training program . Clinical effect assess change symptom pain ( VISA-A VAS score ) , tendon ultrasound thickness muscle function ( one-legged heel-rise test ) . All outcome measure record baseline 6 week , 12 week 6 month follow-up . Results : Will se change difference group ( HVI , ACP Placebo ) VISA-A score , VAS score , ultrasound ( tendon thickness ) muscle function . Statistics : All data analyze SigmaPlot v11 use two-way repeated measure ANOVA Student-Newman-Keuls Post-hoc test . This use see change time group ( time effect ) differences group within time-points ( group effect ) . All data present mean Â± SEM time .
